title: Tales From the Café: Volume 1
description: Tales From The Café is a collection of 23 stories by 23 writers covering a wide-variety of genres. It is a diverse collection of tales, from gothic horror in the Wild West to the battlefields of World War II, from twitter-obsessed fairytale princesses to a time travelling taxidermist. This collection really does have something for everyone.Advisory Some stories have adult content.
author: Neil Stevens
